steps.title: Enemy at the Gate - Get Splitting Steel
steps.description: Get Splitting Steel reward from quest completion

reward.name: Splitting Steel
reward.usage_notes: Excellent starting skill. Good range and damage for early game.

steps.gear_focus: Look for good weapon base and red sockets

reward.name: Onslaught Support
reward.usage_notes: Great early damage/speed boost. Provides attack and movement speed.

steps.title: The Caged Brute - Get Leap Slam

reward.name: Leap Slam
reward.usage_notes: Primary movement skill. Use with 2-handed weapon for mobility.

steps.title: The Siren's Cadence - Get Sunder
steps.description: Get Sunder and transition to AoE skill

reward.name: Sunder
reward.usage_notes: Solid AoE skill. Excellent for clearing packs of enemies.

steps.gear_focus: Focus on high physical damage 2-handed weapons
steps.currency_notes: Save for upcoming support gem purchases

steps.title: Sharp and Cruel - Get Melee Physical Damage
steps.description: Get Melee Physical Damage support gem

reward.name: Melee Physical Damage
reward.usage_notes: Core support for physical melee builds. MORE physical damage.

steps.gear_focus: Continue looking for high physical damage weapons
steps.currency_notes: Save currency for upcoming aura purchases

steps.title: Intruders in Black - Get Herald of Ash

reward.name: Herald of Ash
reward.usage_notes: Fire damage aura. Adds flat fire damage and overkill explosions.

steps.gear_focus: Look for life and resistance gear

steps.title: Lost in Love - Get Determination and Pride
steps.description: Get both Determination and Pride auras (Scion gets both)

reward.name: Determination
reward.usage_notes: Key defensive aura. Essential for physical damage reduction.

vendor.name: Pride
vendor.usage_notes: Physical damage aura. All auras are rewards for Scion.

steps.title: Sever the Right Hand - Get Boneshatter and Impale
steps.description: Get Boneshatter and Impale (Scion gets both)

reward.name: Boneshatter
reward.usage_notes: Can replace Sunder for single target. Higher damage but requires trauma management.

vendor.name: Impale Support
vendor.usage_notes: Damage support for pure physical builds. Stacks impale for MORE damage.

steps.gear_focus: Upgrade to higher tier weapon base
